content.rendered:
Sun, sand and books

Books on the beach lit-fest.

A branding for a lit-fest, organised by the non-profit India Book Foundation and supported by Kerala Tourism. The event would see writers of prose and poetry, fiction and nonfiction, essayists and environmentalists, artists and academics, reporters and editors conduct readings and recitals besides participating in meaningful debates and dialogues on a multitude of topics.
